frontmatter.title: Layer5 Launches Kanvas: A Collaborative Platform for Cloud Native Infrastructure
frontmatter.subtitle: Enabling teams to collaboratively design, deploy, and manage cloud native infrastructure without finger-pointing
frontmatter.author: The Newsroom
frontmatter.description: Layer5 announces Kanvas, a collaboration platform for engineering teams managing cloud native infrastructure. Built on Meshery, Kanvas provides an intuitive design suite for engineers to visualize, manage, and collaboratively design multi-cloud and Kubernetes-native infrastructure.
